channel.title: 667/*** ::players Command w/Interface
channel.description:
Hello I was wondering if someone could show me how to write the ::players command for a 667/7** Source with interface showing players that are online
-Thanks Rep++

item.title: 667/*** ::players Command w/Interface
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

OK, iv made one so it loads up the interface. it’s not perfect but i did it in like 4 mins. It just needs tweaking but hey, heres a start.

Ok so go to commands and where you have ::home commands etc add there this:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("players2")) {
			player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
			player.getPackets()
			.sendIComponentText(275, 2, Settings.SERVER_NAME);
			player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 16,
					"There are currently " + World.getPlayers().size()
						+ " players playing " + Settings.SERVER_NAME
						+ ".");
		return true;
			

	                }

Ok so just do ::players2 and it loads it up! It needs tweaking but here you go!

Read full topic
